infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to show nearby nature spots on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs your location to show nearby nature spots on the map.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access for voice conversations with your nature therapy coach.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Enable Face ID to quickly and securely sign in to NatureUP Health.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: NatureUP would like to read your activity data to personalize excursions and track your wellness progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: NatureUP would like to save your nature excursions as workouts and mindful minutes to Apple Health.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to access your location to show nearby nature spots.

plugins.healthSharePermission: NatureUP would like to read your activity data to personalize excursions and track your wellness progress.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: NatureUP would like to save your nature excursions as workouts and mindful minutes to Apple Health.
